product_name: PRO-TEC IPS Lo Pro Capri Hip Pads - Women's
long_description: Providing impact protection without advertising their presence to the world, the PRO-TEC IPS Lo Pro Capri hip pads offer women a slim-fitting, low profile, stretch fit. Strategically placed padding helps protect hips, thighs and tailbone from unexpected spills. Polyester and spandex fabric wicks moisture and promotes breathability. Capris feature anatomic stretch-fit construction in a flexible, lightweight, breathable design and they move with you without inhibiting performance. PRO-TEC IPS Lo Pro Capri hip pads are machine washable.
short_description: Providing impact protection without advertising their presence to the world, the PRO-TEC IPS Lo Pro Capri hip pads offer women a slim-fitting, low profile, stretch fit.
